rooms.description: Large open space combining living room, dining area, and kitchenette; designed in Mediterranean style with high ceilings and decorative arches. Vastu compliant entrance orientation.
Spacious hall with reception desk and storage, adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, incorporating large windows for natural light; designed in Mediterranean style with warm colors and textures.
Secondary bedroom with private balcony overlooking garden area, ensuring privacy and fresh air while respecting Vastu guidelines on room placement.
Full bathroom attached to the master bedroom; designed for privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Grand double door with decorative elements, ensuring secure and welcoming access in line with Vastu principles.
Large windows strategically placed for optimal natural light and ventilation; compliant with local building codes.
